SCTX:
Begin penumbra2Script

short doOnce

if ( GetJournalIndex BM_Sun < 10 )
	return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex BM_Sun >= 30 )
	return
endif

if ( doOnce == 0 )
	if ( GetDistance Player <= 512 )
		Journal BM_Sun 30
		set doOnce to 1
	endif
endif







End penumbra2Script
